name: Snivy
description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
abilities.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
